text: Hagi ama anazamofo nanekema vahe'ma nezamasamisanke'za zamagra anage hugahaze. Nagafare Ra Anumzamo'a ama ana hazenke zantamina atre'nigeno tagritera egahie? huza hugahaze. Tagra na'a havizana hu'nona zante tazeri haviza hunakura nehie? Ra Anumzana tagri Anumzamofo avufina inan kumi tagra hu'none hu'za hugahaze?
